attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am Disabled and have had experienced Negative Discrimination and Deformation of Character.  

These stressfull remits are illegal and an offence to commit.  

Everybody ought to have an effective right to remedy and be able to access legal representation.

As the situation stands Solicitors choose not to recognize Discrimination.

rejection.details: Please make your title a clear and understandable call for action ie. a normal sentence.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
